20101202141308.000|20101202141309.000|CCO|    WITH XEROX, YOU'RE READY
20101202141309.000|20101202141310.000|CCO|    
20101202141310.000|20101202141311.000|CCO|          FOR REAL BUSINESS.
20101202141311.000|20101202141311.909|CCO|      TO SFI      YOU MIGHT ALSO WANT
20101202141311.909|20101202141312.818|CCO|      TO TRY LIFTING ONE OF THESE.
20101202141312.818|20101202141313.727|CCO|      A UNIQUE SEA SALT ADDED
20101202141313.727|20101202141314.636|CCO|      TO OVER 40 CAMPBELL'S
20101202141314.636|20101202141315.545|CCO|
20101202141315.545|20101202141316.455|CCO|      CONDENSED SOUPS.
20101202141316.455|20101202141317.364|CCO|      HELPS US REDUCE SODIUM,
20101202141317.364|20101202141318.273|CCO|    
20101202141318.273|20101202141319.182|CCO|        BUT NOT FLAVOR.
20101202141319.182|20101202141320.091|CCO|    
20101202141320.091|20101202141321.000|CCO|        SO DO A FEW LIFTS.
20101202141321.000|20101202141324.333|CCO|      CAMPBELL'S. IT'S AMAZING
20101202141324.333|20101202141327.667|CCO|    
20101202141327.667|20101202141451.000|CCO|        WHAT SOUP CAN DO.
20101202141451.000|20101202142807.000|SEG_01|Type=Story start
20101202141451.000|20101202142807.000|SEG|Type=Story
20101202141451.000|20101202141456.000|CCO|>>> DON'T ASK, DON'T TELL.
20101202141456.000|20101202141501.000|CCO|>> LET'S GO TO SENATOR JOHN 
20101202141501.000|20101202141502.667|CCO|McCAIN DELIVERING HIS OPENING 
20101202141502.667|20101202141504.333|CCO|STATEMENT AT THE ARMS SERVICES 
20101202141504.333|20101202141506.000|CCO|HEARING ON DON'T ASK, DON'T 
20101202141506.000|20101202141507.667|CCO|TELL.
20101202141507.667|20101202141509.333|CCO|>> -- IT'S NO DIFFERENT AMONG 
20101202141509.333|20101202141511.000|CCO|THE U.S. MILITARY AS THE 
20101202141511.000|20101202141513.000|CCO|PENTAGON'S REPORT DEMONSTRATES.
20101202141513.000|20101202141515.000|CCO|HOWEVER, I THINK WE CAN ALL 
20101202141515.000|20101202141517.000|CCO|AGREE ON A FEW FACTS AS WE BEGIN
20101202141517.000|20101202141519.000|CCO|THIS IMPORTANT HEARING.
20101202141519.000|20101202141521.000|CCO|WE CAN ALL AGREE THAT OUR 
20101202141521.000|20101202141523.000|CCO|MILITARY TODAY IS THE MOST 
20101202141523.000|20101202141525.000|CCO|EFFECTIVE, MOST PROFESSIONAL AND
20101202141525.000|20101202141527.000|CCO|ARGUABLY THE MOST EXPERIENCED 
20101202141527.000|20101202141529.000|CCO|FORCE THAT OUR NATION HAS EVER 
20101202141529.000|20101202141531.000|CCO|HAD.
20101202141531.000|20101202141533.000|CCO|WE CAN ALL AGREE THAT WE 
20101202141533.000|20101202141535.000|CCO|APPRECIATE AND HONOR THE SERVICE
20101202141535.000|20101202141537.000|CCO|OF EVERY AMERICAN WHO WEARS THE 
20101202141537.000|20101202141539.000|CCO|UNIFORM OF OUR COUNTRY AS WELL 
20101202141539.000|20101202141541.000|CCO|AS THEIR FAMILIES, ESPECIALLY 
20101202141541.000|20101202141543.000|CCO|DURING THIS TIME OF WAR, 
20101202141543.000|20101202141545.000|CCO|REGARDLESS OF WHETHER THEY ARE 
20101202141545.000|20101202141547.000|CCO|STRAIGHT OR GAY.
20101202141547.000|20101202141549.000|CCO|AND FINALLY, I THINK WE CAN ALL 
20101202141549.000|20101202141551.000|CCO|AGREE -- AND I CERTAIN
20101202141551.000|20101202141553.000|CCO|WOULD -- THAT THIS CAPABLE, 
20101202141553.000|20101202141555.000|CCO|PROFESSIONAL FORCE OF OURS 
20101202141555.000|20101202141557.000|CCO|COULD -- AND I EMPHASIZE 
20101202141557.000|20101202141559.000|CCO|COULD -- COULD IMPLEMENT A 
20101202141559.000|20101202141601.000|CCO|REPEAL OF DON'T ASK, DON'T TELL,
20101202141601.000|20101202141603.500|CCO|IF SO ASKED TO, JUST AS THEY SO 
20101202141603.500|20101202141606.000|CCO|ABLY TO WHAT ELSE IS ASKED OF 
20101202141606.000|20101202141608.500|CCO|THEM.
20101202141608.500|20101202141611.000|CCO|WHAT I WANT TO KNOW AND 
20101202141611.000|20101202141612.667|CCO|CONGRESS' DUTY TO PERFORM, NOT 
20101202141612.667|20101202141614.333|CCO|WHETHER THEY CAN IMPLEMENT A 
20101202141614.333|20101202141616.000|CCO|REPEAL OF THIS LAW BUT WHETHER 
20101202141616.000|20101202141617.667|CCO|THE LAW SHOULD BE REPEALED.
20101202141617.667|20101202141619.333|CCO|UNFORTUNATELY THAT KEY ISSUE WAS
20101202141619.333|20101202141621.000|CCO|NOT THE FOCUS OF THIS STUDY.
20101202141621.000|20101202141622.667|CCO|IT IS, HOWEVER, THE FUNDAMENTAL 
20101202141622.667|20101202141624.333|CCO|QUESTION THAT MUST BE ANSWERED 
20101202141624.333|20101202141626.000|CCO|BY CONGRESS, NOT BY THE 
20101202141626.000|20101202141627.667|CCO|PRESIDENT OR THE COURTS, BUT BY 
20101202141627.667|20101202141629.333|CCO|CONGRESS.
20101202141629.333|20101202141631.000|CCO|AND IT IS A QUESTION THAT MUST 
20101202141631.000|20101202141633.000|CCO|BE ANSWERED CAREFULLY, 
20101202141633.000|20101202141635.000|CCO|DELIBERATELY, AND WITH PROPER 
20101202141635.000|20101202141637.000|CCO|CONSIDERATION FOR THE COMPLEXITY
20101202141637.000|20101202141639.000|CCO|OF THE ISSUE AND THE GRAVITY OF 
20101202141639.000|20101202141641.000|CCO|THE POTENTIAL CONSEQUENCES FOR 
20101202141641.000|20101202141643.000|CCO|OUR MILITARY AND THE WARS IN 
20101202141643.000|20101202141645.000|CCO|WHICH WE ARE ENGAGED.
20101202141645.000|20101202141647.000|CCO|THE DEFENSE DEPARTMENT HAS HAD 
20101202141647.000|20101202141649.000|CCO|TEN MONTHS TO COMPLETE THIS 
20101202141649.000|20101202141651.000|CCO|REP AND THE RAND STUDY THAT 
20101202141651.000|20101202141652.667|CCO|ACCOMPANIES IT.
20101202141652.667|20101202141654.333|CCO|TOGETHER THESE REPORTS AND 
20101202141654.333|20101202141656.000|CCO|SUPPORTING DOCUMENTATION CONTAIN
20101202141656.000|20101202141657.667|CCO|OVER 1,500 PAGES OF DATA, 
20101202141657.667|20101202141659.333|CCO|MATERIAL, AND ANALYSIS.
20101202141659.333|20101202141701.000|CCO|THE MEMBERS OF THIS COMMITTEE 
20101202141701.000|20101202141702.667|CCO|RECEIVED IT 36 HOURS AGO, AND MY
20101202141702.667|20101202141704.333|CCO|STAFF AND I ARE STILL GOING 
20101202141704.333|20101202141706.000|CCO|THROUGH IT AND ANALYZING IT 
20101202141706.000|20101202141707.667|CCO|CAREFULLY, INCLUDING THE MORE 
20101202141707.667|20101202141709.333|CCO|THAN 72,000 COMMENTS THAT OUR 
20101202141709.333|20101202141711.000|CCO|SERVICE MEMBERS PROVIDED TO THE 
20101202141711.000|20101202141713.000|CCO|WORKING GROUP.
20101202141713.000|20101202141715.000|CCO|WHAT I CAN SAY NOW, HOWEVER, IS 
20101202141715.000|20101202141717.000|CCO|THAT IN ADDITION TO MY CONCERNS 
20101202141717.000|20101202141719.000|CCO|ABOUT WHAT QUESTIONS WERE NOT 
20101202141719.000|20101202141721.000|CCO|ASKED BY THIS SURVEY AND 
20101202141721.000|20101202141723.500|CCO|CONSIDERED IN THIS REPORT, I'M 
20101202141723.500|20101202141726.000|CCO|TROUBLED BY THE FACT THAT THIS 
20101202141726.000|20101202141728.500|CCO|REPORT ONLY REPRESENTS THE INPUT
20101202141728.500|20101202141731.000|CCO|OF 28% OF THE FORCE WHO RECEIVED
20101202141731.000|20101202141732.667|CCO|THE QUESTIONNAIRE.
20101202141732.667|20101202141734.333|CCO|INCLUDING COMPLETELY LEAVING OUT
20101202141734.333|20101202141736.000|CCO|NUMEROUS MEMBERS OF THE MILITARY
20101202141736.000|20101202141737.667|CCO|IN COMBAT AREAS.
20101202141737.667|20101202141739.333|CCO|THAT'S ONLY 6% OF THE FORCE AT 
20101202141739.333|20101202141741.000|CCO|LARGE.
20101202141741.000|20101202141743.000|CCO|I FIND IT HARD TO VIEW THAT AS A
20101202141743.000|20101202141745.000|CCO|FULLY REPRESENTATIVE SAMPLE SET,
20101202141745.000|20101202141747.000|CCO|BUT I'M NONETHELESS WEIGHING THE
20101202141747.000|20101202141749.000|CCO|CONTENTS OF THIS REPORT ON THEIR
20101202141749.000|20101202141751.000|CCO|MERITS.
20101202141751.000|20101202141754.333|CCO|WHAT APPEARS CLEAR AT THIS TIME 
20101202141754.333|20101202141757.667|CCO|IS THAT THE SURVEY AND ANECDOTAL
20101202141757.667|20101202141801.000|CCO|DATA UNDERLYING THIS REPORT DID 
20101202141801.000|20101202141803.000|CCO|NOT LEAD TO ONE UNEQUIVOCAL 
20101202141803.000|20101202141805.000|CCO|CONCLUSION WHICH IS NO SURPRISE 
20101202141805.000|20101202141807.000|CCO|CONSIDERING THE COMPLEX AND 
20101202141807.000|20101202141809.000|CCO|DIFFICULT NATURE OF THIS ISSUE.
20101202141809.000|20101202141811.000|CCO|SO, FOR EXAMPLE, I RECOGNIZE 
20101202141811.000|20101202141813.500|CCO|THAT OF THOSE SURVEYED WHO 
20101202141813.500|20101202141816.000|CCO|REPORT HAVING WORKED WITH A GAY 
20101202141816.000|20101202141818.500|CCO|SERVICE MEMBER, 92% SAID THEIR 
20101202141818.500|20101202141821.000|CCO|UNIT'S ABILITY TO WORK TOGETHER 
20101202141821.000|20101202141823.000|CCO|WAS NOT NEGATIVELY AFFECTED.
20101202141823.000|20101202141825.000|CCO|AMONG THOSE IN ARMY COMBAT 
20101202141825.000|20101202141827.000|CCO|UNITS, 89% OF RESPONDENTS FELT 
20101202141827.000|20101202141829.000|CCO|THAT WAY, AS DID 84% OF 
20101202141829.000|20101202141831.000|CCO|RESPONDENTS IN MARINE COMBAT 
20101202141831.000|20101202141833.500|CCO|UNITS.
20101202141833.500|20101202141836.000|CCO|HOWEVER, WE ALSO LEARNED THAT OF
20101202141836.000|20101202141838.500|CCO|THOSE SURVEYED, 30% OF THE 
20101202141838.500|20101202141841.000|CCO|TOTAL, 43% OF THE MARINES, 48% 
20101202141841.000|20101202141843.500|CCO|OF ARMY COMBAT UNITS, AND 58% OF
20101202141843.500|20101202141846.000|CCO|MARINE COMBAT UNITS BELIEVE THAT
20101202141846.000|20101202141848.500|CCO|A REPEAL OF THE LAW WOULD HAVE A
20101202141848.500|20101202141851.000|CCO|NEGATIVE OR VERY NEGATIVE IMPACT
20101202141851.000|20101202141853.500|CCO|ON THEIR UNIT'S ABILITY TO, 
20101202141853.500|20101202141856.000|CCO|QUOTE, WORK TOGETHER TO GET THE 
20101202141856.000|20101202141858.500|CCO|JOB DONE.
20101202141858.500|20101202141901.000|CCO|FURTHERMORE, 67% OF MARINES AND 
20101202141901.000|20101202141903.500|CCO|NEARLY 58% OF ARMY SOLDIERS IN 
20101202141903.500|20101202141906.000|CCO|COMBAT UNITS BELIEVE THAT REPEAL
20101202141906.000|20101202141908.500|CCO|OF THE LAW WOULD HAVE NEGATIVE 
20101202141908.500|20101202141911.000|CCO|CONSEQUENCES ON UNIT COHESION IN
20101202141911.000|20101202141912.667|CCO|A FIELD ENVIRONMENT OR OUT AT 
20101202141912.667|20101202141914.333|CCO|SEA.
20101202141914.333|20101202141916.000|CCO|THIS IS SUPPLEMENTED BY COMMENTS
20101202141916.000|20101202141917.667|CCO|LIKE THESE, QUOTE, I BELIEVE 
20101202141917.667|20101202141919.333|CCO|THIS IS NOT THE TIME FOR US TO 
20101202141919.333|20101202141921.000|CCO|MAKE THIS -- MAKE HUGE CHANGES 
20101202141921.000|20101202141922.667|CCO|IN THE MILITARY.
20101202141922.667|20101202141924.333|CCO|WE'RE AT WAR, AND OUR MEN AND 
20101202141924.333|20101202141926.000|CCO|WOMEN OVERSEAS DO NOT NEED ANY 
20101202141926.000|20101202141927.667|CCO|MORE DISTRACTION.
20101202141927.667|20101202141929.333|CCO|THIS ISSUE SHOULD BE ADDRESSED 
20101202141929.333|20101202141931.000|CCO|AT THE APPROPRIATE TIME.
20101202141931.000|20101202141933.500|CCO|THIS TIME IS NOT NOW, UNQUOTE.
20101202141933.500|20101202141936.000|CCO|I REMAIN CONCERNED, AS I HAVE IN
20101202141936.000|20101202141938.500|CCO|THE PAST, AND AS DEMONSTRATED IN
20101202141938.500|20101202141941.000|CCO|THIS STUDY, THAT THE CLOSER WE 
20101202141941.000|20101202141942.667|CCO|GET TO SERVICE MEMBERS IN 
20101202141942.667|20101202141944.333|CCO|COMBAT, THE MORE WE ENCOUNTER 
20101202141944.333|20101202141946.000|CCO|CONCERNS ABOUT WHETHER DON'T 
20101202141946.000|20101202141947.667|CCO|ASK, DON'T TELL SHOULD BE 
20101202141947.667|20101202141949.333|CCO|REPEALED AND WHAT IMPACT THAT 
20101202141949.333|20101202141951.000|CCO|WOULD HAVE ON THE ABILITY OF 
20101202141951.000|20101202141953.000|CCO|THESE UNITS TO PERFORM THEIR 
20101202141953.000|20101202141955.000|CCO|MISSION.
20101202141955.000|20101202141957.000|CCO|THESE VIEWS SHOULD NOT BE 
20101202141957.000|20101202141959.000|CCO|CONSIDERED LIGHTLY.
20101202141959.000|20101202142001.000|CCO|ESPECIALLY CONSIDERING HOW MUCH 
20101202142001.000|20101202142003.000|CCO|COMBAT OUR FORCES FACE.
20101202142003.000|20101202142005.000|CCO|ADDITIONALLY I'M CONCERNED ABOUT
20101202142005.000|20101202142007.000|CCO|THE IMPACT OF A RUSH TO REPEAL 
20101202142007.000|20101202142009.000|CCO|WHEN EVEN THIS SURVEY HAS FOUND 
20101202142009.000|20101202142011.000|CCO|THAT SUCH A SIGNIFICANT NUMBER 
20101202142011.000|20101202142012.667|CCO|OF OUR SERVICE MEMBERS FEEL THAT
20101202142012.667|20101202142014.333|CCO|IT WOULD NEGATIVELY IMPACT 
20101202142014.333|20101202142016.000|CCO|MILITARY EFFECTIVENESS.
20101202142016.000|20101202142017.667|CCO|AS WE MOVE FORWARD WITH OUR 
20101202142017.667|20101202142019.333|CCO|DISCUSSION ON THIS MATTER, I 
20101202142019.333|20101202142021.000|CCO|HOPE THAT EVERYONE WILL PUT 
20101202142021.000|20101202142022.667|CCO|ASIDE POLITICAL MOTIVES AND 
20101202142022.667|20101202142024.333|CCO|AGENDAS.
20101202142024.333|20101202142026.000|CCO|I ALSO HOPE THAT EVERYONE ON 
20101202142026.000|20101202142027.667|CCO|BOTH SIDES WILL REFRAIN FROM 
20101202142027.667|20101202142029.333|CCO|QUESTIONING PEOPLE'S INTEGRITY.
20101202142029.333|20101202142031.000|CCO|FINALLY, I HOPE THAT EVERYONE 
20101202142031.000|20101202142033.500|CCO|WILL RECOGNIZE THAT THIS DEBATE 
20101202142033.500|20101202142036.000|CCO|IS FOCUSED ON OUR MILITARY AND 
20101202142036.000|20101202142038.500|CCO|ITS EFFECTIVENESS, NOT ON 
20101202142038.500|20101202142041.000|CCO|BROADER SOCIAL ISSUES BEING 
20101202142041.000|20101202142043.000|CCO|DEBATED IN OUR SOCIETY AT LARGE.
20101202142043.000|20101202142045.000|CCO|THIS IS A COMPLEX AND IMPORTANT 
20101202142045.000|20101202142047.000|CCO|ISSUE THAT COULD HAVE 
20101202142047.000|20101202142049.000|CCO|SIGNIFICANT REPERCUSSIONS FOR 
20101202142049.000|20101202142051.000|CCO|OUR FORCE, A FORCE THAT IS 
20101202142051.000|20101202142052.667|CCO|ENGAGED IN ITS TENTH STRAIGHT 
20101202142052.667|20101202142054.333|CCO|YEAR OF SUSTAINED COMBAT.
20101202142054.333|20101202142056.000|CCO|BUT A FORCE THAT IS PERFORMING 
20101202142056.000|20101202142057.667|CCO|EXCEPTIONALLY WELL.
20101202142057.667|20101202142059.333|CCO|AT THIS TIME WE SHOULD BE 
20101202142059.333|20101202142101.000|CCO|INHERENTLY CAUTIOUS ABOUT MAKING
20101202142101.000|20101202142102.667|CCO|ANY CHANGES THAT WOULD AFFECT 
20101202142102.667|20101202142104.333|CCO|OUR MILITARY AND WHAT CHANGES WE
20101202142104.333|20101202142106.000|CCO|DO MAKE SHOULD BE THE PRODUCT OF
20101202142106.000|20101202142107.667|CCO|CAREFUL AND DELIBERATE 
20101202142107.667|20101202142109.333|CCO|CONSIDERATION.
20101202142109.333|20101202142111.000|CCO|I'M NOT SAYING THAT THIS LAW 
20101202142111.000|20101202142113.000|CCO|SHOULD NEVER CHANGE.
20101202142113.000|20101202142115.000|CCO|I AM SIMPLY SAYING THAT IT MAY 
20101202142115.000|20101202142117.000|CCO|BE PREMATURE TO MAKE SUCH A 
20101202142117.000|20101202142119.000|CCO|CHANGE AT THIS TIME AND IN THIS 
20101202142119.000|20101202142121.000|CCO|MANNER WITHOUT FURTHER 
20101202142121.000|20101202142122.667|CCO|CONSIDERATION OF THIS REPORT AND
20101202142122.667|20101202142124.333|CCO|FURTHER STUDY OF THE ISSUE BY 
20101202142124.333|20101202142126.000|CCO|CONGRESS.
20101202142126.000|20101202142127.667|CCO|FOR OF ALL THE PEOPLE WE SERVE, 
20101202142127.667|20101202142129.333|CCO|ONE OF OUR HIGHEST 
20101202142129.333|20101202142131.000|CCO|RESPONSIBILITIES IS TO THE MEN 
20101202142131.000|20101202142132.429|CCO|AND WOMEN OF OUR ARMED SERVICES,
20101202142132.429|20101202142133.857|CCO|ESPECIALLY THOSE RISKING THEIR 
20101202142133.857|20101202142135.286|CCO|LIVES IN COMBAT.
20101202142135.286|20101202142136.714|CCO|THANK YOU, MR. CHAIRMAN.
20101202142136.714|20101202142138.143|CCO|>> THANK YOU VERY MUCH, SENATOR 
20101202142138.143|20101202142139.571|CCO|McCAIN.

20101202142141.000|20101202142142.429|CCO|OPENING OF A TWO-DAY HEARING ON

20101202142143.857|20101202142145.286|CCO|ASK, DON'T TELL.

20101202142148.143|20101202142149.571|CCO|REPUBLICAN IN LEADERSHIP NOW 
20101202142149.571|20101202142151.000|CCO|JOINS.
20101202142151.000|20101202142153.000|CCO|AND SENATOR ALEXANDER, THANK YOU
20101202142153.000|20101202142155.000|CCO|FOR WAITING FOR SENATOR McCAIN 
20101202142155.000|20101202142157.000|CCO|TO WRAP UP HIS STATEMENT.
20101202142157.000|20101202142159.000|CCO|>> THANK YOU, CHUCK.
20101202142159.000|20101202142201.000|CCO|>> LET'S ME ASK YOU ABOUT 
20101202142201.000|20101202142202.429|CCO|SECRETARY OF DEFENSE GATES' 
20101202142202.429|20101202142203.857|CCO|ARGUMENT WHICH HE'S BEEN MAKING 
20101202142203.857|20101202142205.286|CCO|WHICH IS THIS, BECAUSE OBVIOUSLY
20101202142205.286|20101202142206.714|CCO|SENATOR McCAIN IS SAYING, HEY, 
20101202142206.714|20101202142208.143|CCO|THIS IS NOT THE TIME TO DEAL 
20101202142208.143|20101202142209.571|CCO|WITH THIS.
20101202142209.571|20101202142211.000|CCO|THE PROBLEM YOU MAY HAVE, 
20101202142211.000|20101202142212.429|CCO|THOUGH, THE COURT SYSTEM MAY NOT
20101202142212.429|20101202142213.857|CCO|BE ON THE SAME CALENDAR THAT 
20101202142213.857|20101202142215.286|CCO|SOME IN CONGRESS WOULD LIKE TO 
20101202142215.286|20101202142216.714|CCO|HAVE, THAT SENATOR McCAIN WOULD 
20101202142216.714|20101202142218.143|CCO|LIKE TO HAVE.
20101202142218.143|20101202142219.571|CCO|DO YOU BELIEVE THAT SECRETARY 
20101202142219.571|20101202142221.000|CCO|GATES' ARGUMENT ABOUT THE COURT 
20101202142221.000|20101202142222.667|CCO|SYSTEM HAS MERIT HERE AND MAYBE 
20101202142222.667|20101202142224.333|CCO|IS A REASON TO GO AHEAD AND DEAL
20101202142224.333|20101202142226.000|CCO|WITH THIS NOW?
20101202142226.000|20101202142227.667|CCO|>> NO, I DON'T.
20101202142227.667|20101202142229.333|CCO|NO, I DON'T.
